description: Aromatic Thai flavours make this rice salad a must-have on your festive table. This colourful side dish will complement your Christmas spread.
name: Thai-inspired Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 spring onions, thinly sliced on the diagonal
1 fresh long green chilli, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice according to packet instructions, following the absorption method. Cool.
Juice 1 1/2 of the limes, then cut remaining lime into cheeks. Whisk sauces and lime juice in a large bowl.
Add cabbage, carrot, onion, coriander, sprouts and rice to bowl. Season, then toss to combine. Sprinkle with peanuts and chilli. Serve with lime cheeks.
